item.title: Large bee nest near Tong Farm pathway, 21st June
item.description:
There is a large bees nest by the little pool by the bridge. The nest is large and in the ground, between pool and pathway. Suggest this be removed for health and safety reasons as passers by or dogs could easily be stung - bees very active!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Botany Bay Lane, Chislehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large branch fallen, 21st June

item.title: Bush with 3 foot sightline is now an 8 foot overgrown bush, 21st June
item.description:
I would like to report a bush that is vastly overgrown. The branches are sticking out onto the pedestrian pathway. This poses a scratching risk to pedestrians walking past. I kindly request that the branch be trimmed as soon as possible. This bush is meant to have a 3 foot sightline but it is now well over 8 feet. Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tonge Close, Eden Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 massive pot holes which have been for months now., 21st June
item.description:
It’s absolutely ridiculous that the council still hasn’t fixed these pot holes. Cars parked all the time so impossible to avoid too, therefore car is bound to be damaged. The council doesn’t care at all.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5,7,9, High Street, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet
